name: BedtimeGuardian
0:
”Alexa, open Bedtime Guardian”
”Alexa, ask the Bedtime Guardian to scan the room for bad guys”
”Alexa, ask the Bedtime Guardian to protect the room”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bedtime guardian
des:
I am your Bedtime Guardian. I will help you scan and protect your room from monsters, ghosts, and bad guys!

You can ask me to scan the room, or you can ask me to protect your room.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
